value:
Hot springs warm you up from your
head to the tips of your toes. And
they're good for injuries, too!

I'm pretty good at finding hot springs
back in Hoshido, you know. I know
quite a few hidden gems!

Soaking in a hot spring is good for
both body and soul. I'm never
happier than after a good soak!

If you d-don't mind the suggestion,
how about everyone in the Order
visits a hot spring sometime soon?

Hmm, it looks like I'm out of fresh
towels... I'll need to ask Hana to bring
me some.

Did you know there's a hot spring
right near your castle? Oh, this is
from $Nf.

How wonderful! This is all thanks
to the hot spring, I'm sure!

I think I've earned myself another
dip in the hot spring after this!
Oh no, my towel got wet!

I feel so toasty right now! I can
keep going!

I'm Princess Sakura of Hoshido. I had
just found a hidden hot spring when I
was summoned here!$k$pOh, b-but, I'm glad to be here... And
it's good to meet you!

Ahh... What a relaxing soak... I'm
completely warm, from the inside out!
I'm so glad there are hot springs here.$k$pRelaxing in a hot spring was one of
the few comforts I could enjoy while
Hoshido was at war.$k$pThrough my studies as a healer, I
learned they're actually very effective
at treating injuries.$k$pAnd I don't just mean physical
injuries. A good soak can heal your
soul, too.$k$pW-well, that's how I look at it,
anyway...$k$pI always feel like I can give each day
my very best as long as I know a hot
spring is waiting at the end of it.$k$pSo you be sure to take some time for
yourself and have a good soak, too,
OK?
はぁ
ふぅ
きゃああっ！
だめですっ
This'll warm you right up.
Ah, refreshing!
N-no peeking!
Hidden Hot Spring Blast!
I'm...going back in...
えっと…
Let's warm up!
All toasty.
I apologize for my, um...lack of p-proper battle attire...
Huh? I'm so sleepy... I think I was in the water too long.
We have many hot springs in Hoshido.
There's nothing better than soaking in a hot spring. It warms your body from head to toe!
Want to join me at the foot baths?
Ah? Oh!
What should I do?
I can change later.
